title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 111
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 111

State Regulations

Revocation Of Certificate Of Approval

To Operate Drug Abuse Treatment

And/Or Preventive Education Programs
A Certificate Of Approval having been granted by the New York

State Drug Abuse Control

Commission to
___________
(Voluntary Agency) to operate a drug abuse treatment and/or
pre-
ventive education program, and it having been found that such
agency is in violation of the Rules and Regulations of the Commission as
follows: IT IS ORDERED that such Certificate Of Approval is hereby
revoked effective ________. YOU ARE HEREBY GIVEN NOTICE that pursuant to the provisions of

Chapter XXV of Title 14 NYCRR
2020.11
you may, within thirty days of the date
hereof, request the Commission to grant a hearing to review this revocation of
your Certificate of Approval. Any such request shall be made in writing and
served upon the Commission at its address shown below. Dated: ________
____________
Secretary for: New York State

Drug Abuse Control

Commission

Albany, New York 12203

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
111

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
